narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bradley/cleveland Developmental Services is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Cleveland, TN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $6.1M in Medicaid payments across 33K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $6.1M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
